concept.title: Extension Call Pickup
concept.shortdesc: When a user wants to pick up a call that is ringing at the other extension that is not in the same pickup group, the user can dial "Extension Pickup feature code (default *04) + Extension Number" to pick up the call.

section.title: Extension Call Pickup Feature Code
section.p: The default Extension Call Pickup feature code is *04.
You can change the code on Settings PBX General Feature Code Extension Pickup .

section.title: Operation
section.p: Dial *04[EXT_NUM] to pick up a call.
For example, the ringing extension number is 1000, you should dial *041000 to pick up the call.
